Name: survey_id
Description: unique ID given by target survey

Name: Z_BEST
Description: 'best' redshift selected from 4 source catalogs; see Willett & Galloway et al. 2016 Section 2.6

Name: Z_BEST_TYPE
Description: 'best' redshift type: SPEC_Z = spectroscopic, PHOTO_Z = photometric, GRISM_Z = grism

Name: Z_BEST_SOURCE
Description: source catalog of best redshift ACS-GC, 3DHST, MUSYC, and UltraVISTA

Name: z_spec_conflict_flag
Description: Flag for galaxies whose spectroscopic redshifts differed by dz > .001 in any of the catalogs ACS-GC, 3DHST, and MUSYC. (See Willett & Galloway et al. 2016 Section 2.4)
